title: Unlawful to permit unauthorized person to drive
context: §286-133 Unlawful to permit unauthorized person to drive. Except as provided in section 291E-67, no person shall authorize or knowingly permit a motor vehicle or moped owned by that person or under that person&rsquo;s control to be driven upon any highway by any person who is not authorized under law to drive the motor vehicle or moped. [L 1937, c 234, §30; RL 1945, §7331; RL 1955, §160-63; HRS §286-133; am L 1983, c 197, §1; am L 2010, c 166, §3]
